summary: Redone Jordis\' face to fit the \'maiden\' part of her title
descriptionHtml:
Redid Jordis from scratch instead of tweaking vanilla face. Saw her on my brother\'s save and had just had to change.

NOTE: The neck seam in the image is only there since she is not unlocked in my save and i had to console her to my location. Neck seam is from body replacers anyway...

If you like this, please endorse and check out some of my other NPC face change

------------------

Version 1.1
-Gender animation to female
-Bunch of tiny changes you won\'t notice

------------------
INSTALL
Drop .bsa and .esp into Data folder
 -Put at bottom of load list
 -Will conflict with mods that also change Jordis\' face

------------------

Required mods
ApachiiSkyHair 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168

Recommended mods

You will need these also to replicate my uploaded image:

Coverwomen by MrLenski (any)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563
Covereyes by MrLenski (any)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4869
DIMONIZED UNP female body
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709

------------------
Creds to above for their awesome textures and meshes
author: YellowPaint
